description.name: wbtcsol
description.tagline: Wrapped BTC Solana Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto sol-wbtc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Wrapped BTC Solana directly on your website
Unique sol/wbtc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your sol/wbtc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
